name: Consolidated Communications Holdings, Inc.
description: Consolidated Communications Holdings, Inc. is a leading telecommunications provider that delivers advanced communication services to residential and business customers across the United States. Founded in 1894, the company has evolved from a traditional phone service provider into a comprehensive broadband and telecommunications solutions company. Consolidated Communications offers a wide range of services, including high-speed internet, data, voice, and video services, catering to the growing demand for connectivity in both urban and rural areas. With a strong focus on customer service and technology, the company is dedicated to ensuring reliable and high-quality communication solutions. Consolidated is committed to enhancing its network infrastructure, investing in fiber-optic technology to provide faster and more reliable internet access. Their mission is to empower customers with communication tools that enhance their lives and businesses, bridging the digital divide in underserved communities. Additionally, Consolidated Communications strives to foster innovation in telecommunications and plays a vital role in the local economies it serves, helping businesses thrive in an increasingly digital world.

seo.meta_description: Explore Consolidated Communications Holdings, Inc., a leading telecommunications provider offering high-speed internet, voice, and data services. Discover our commitment to innovation and connectivity.

faq.question: What services does Consolidated Communications offer?
faq.answer: Consolidated Communications offers high-speed internet, voice services, and business solutions including data networking.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Consolidated Communications?
faq.answer: Bob Currey is the CEO of Consolidated Communications Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Consolidated Communications headquartered?
faq.answer: Consolidated Communications is headquartered in Mattoon, Illinois, USA.
